text: HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for June 9- June 15, 2025, includes Guy’s Grocery Games Season 38, Bitchin’ Rides Season 11, Cleaner (2025), Maine Cabin Masters Season 10, and many more. On June 11, Guy’s Grocery Games Season 38 drops on HBO Max. The reality show focuses on Guy Fieri coming up with interesting challenges for chefs. He asks them to prepare dishes with items available in the grocery store. Additionally, they need to fulfill all of his demands while completing the task. Further, Bitchin’ Rides Season 11 will be available on the streaming platform. It revolves around Dave Kindig and his mechanical team taking up interesting tasks for their customers. They decide to customize and establish a set of unique automobiles as per their client’s demands. Also coming out on HBO Max is the action thriller Cleaner (2025). It focuses on radical activities, taking 300 hostages in an annual gala of an energy company, wishing to expose corruption. However, the plans are ruined by an extremist plan to kill everybody. Additionally, Maine Cabin Masters Season 10 premieres on the streaming platform. The reality show chronicles the efforts of Chase Morrill and his team to renovate some of the oldest cabins across Maine. New HBO Max releases for June 9- June 15, 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from June 9- June 15, 2025. Tuesday, June 10 Virgins, Season 1 (TLC) Wednesday, June 11 Guy’s Grocery Games, Season 38 (Food Network) Thursday, June 12 Bitchin’ Rides, Season 11 Mini Beat Power Rockers: A Superheroic Night (Discovery International Friday, June 13 Cleaner (2025) House Hunters: Volume 10, Season 240 (HGTV) Maine Cabin Masters, Season 10 (Magnolia Network) Super Sara (Max Original) Toad & Friends, Season 1B For more HBO Max content, check out the 4K SteelBook release date of The Last of Us Season 2.
html:
HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for June 9- June 15, 2025, includes Guy’s Grocery Games Season 38, Bitchin’ Rides Season 11, Cleaner (2025), Maine Cabin Masters Season 10, and many more.

On June 11, Guy’s Grocery Games Season 38 drops on HBO Max. The reality show focuses on Guy Fieri coming up with interesting challenges for chefs. He asks them to prepare dishes with items available in the grocery store. Additionally, they need to fulfill all of his demands while completing the task.

Further, Bitchin’ Rides Season 11 will be available on the streaming platform. It revolves around Dave Kindig and his mechanical team taking up interesting tasks for their customers. They decide to customize and establish a set of unique automobiles as per their client’s demands.

Also coming out on HBO Max is the action thriller Cleaner (2025). It focuses on radical activities, taking 300 hostages in an annual gala of an energy company, wishing to expose corruption. However, the plans are ruined by an extremist plan to kill everybody.

Additionally, Maine Cabin Masters Season 10 premieres on the streaming platform. The reality show chronicles the efforts of Chase Morrill and his team to renovate some of the oldest cabins across Maine.

New HBO Max releases for June 9- June 15, 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from June 9- June 15, 2025.

Tuesday, June 10

  • Virgins, Season 1 (TLC)

Wednesday, June 11

  • Guy’s Grocery Games, Season 38 (Food Network)

Thursday, June 12

  • Bitchin’ Rides, Season 11
  • Mini Beat Power Rockers: A Superheroic Night (Discovery International

Friday, June 13

  • Cleaner (2025)
  • House Hunters: Volume 10, Season 240 (HGTV)
  • Maine Cabin Masters, Season 10 (Magnolia Network)
  • Super Sara (Max Original)
  • Toad & Friends, Season 1B

For more HBO Max content, check out the 4K SteelBook release date of The Last of Us Season 2.
